pr_title: Improves handling of archives in file based import jobs and especially reworks the archive extraction job.

timeline.message: Uses the new constants as provided by sirius-db.
Makes the FileImportJob use the ArchiveExtractor and adds support for handling auxiliary files.
Uses the new API as defined by the FileImportJob.

Uses the new API as defined by FileImportJob.

This greatly simplifies the internal workings as it eliminates a whole
bunch of duplicate code.
Supports the new API as defined by FileImportJob and adds support to import all sheets of an excel file.
Provides updated translations for the refactored jobs.
Provides some cleanup for the ArchiveImportJob.

Refactors the extract archive job.

By default we now overwrite files if a change is detected (SIRI-279) and also permit to delete
the archive once all files are extracted (SIRI-276).

We also reduced the logging quite a bit (which is still available in debug mode). Also we now
require a destination to be given and no longer use the parent directory of the archive
as fallback (as this provides quite a potential for trouble).
